replies.txt_content:
那你去三樓那帖子裡下吧, 版本差不多... 
安裝請參考MOD區置頂教學帖... 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html
簡單說就是用解壓縮軟件打開 .minecraft\bin\minecraft.jar
先把 ModLoader 裡的文件全丟進去 jar , 並刪除 jar 裡的 META-INF 文件夾
再把 Xray 裡的文件全丟進去 jar , 就這樣...

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
minecraf 1.0.0 xray vb.rar
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=73FZXV2E
http://www.mediafire.com/?5lud78mdcfki87b


The mod comes with 3 funtions:
Xray-> "x" key
Brightness-> "c" key ; Press once to highlight mobs or press twice for everything. 3th time resets to default
Cave finder-> "v" key
You can change the hotkeys in the Controls menu(Yes, the games one).

You can change the blocks you want to show/hide in the menu(ctrl+x).
Red - hidden
Transparent - shown
You change it with ENTER.

x 啟動X光
c 調亮度, 按一次亮怪物, 按兩次亮所有東西, 按三次回復預設
v 找尋洞穴
可自行設置熱鍵

你可以按 ctrl+x 在選單中設置顯示或隱藏方塊
紅色--隱藏
透明--顯示
按Enter切換
